body:
Yes, I've looked at it yesterday. I remember testing the fix back then but I must've looked at the wrong logs... 

We've this issue because we've a substitution which skips registering app-info metrics.
The substitution was there because it registers an MBean.
I suggest we keep the substitution but we call the register metrics.

issue.title: Fix Kafka kafka-version metrics tag missing in native
issue.body:
Call registerMetrics in AppInfoParser substitution

Fixes #42865
